Favorite Feature?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): Favorite Feature?
By Shen the Keeper on Saturday, August 14, 2010 - 07:44 pm:

I'm just curious on people's favorite features in the game.

Mine is the Journal. I can go all ADD, forget what I was doing, then check out the journal to see where I am in my rotation. It's a great addition.

By Rahu on Sunday, August 15, 2010 - 09:36 am:

Oh yeah that is huge.
